svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

id="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-1" value="基于跨模态检索的三维建模方法研究" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="80" width="210" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="370" y="110" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="365" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-1" target="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="370" y="110" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="390" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-5" value="<b>关键技术</b><div>引入困难负样本挖掘算法</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="258" width="150" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-6" value="<b>研究背景</b><div><font face="Helvetica"><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">现有的工作</font><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">忽略了具有挑战性的难分负样本，存在模型的判别能力弱与检索精度低的问题</span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="150" width="150" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-14" value="<font face="Helvetica"><b style="">实现目标</b></font><div><font><font style="" face="Helvetica"><span data-end="461" data-start="448">实现困难负样本挖掘</span>：按相似度阈值筛选“语义接近但不匹配”的假负例，<span style="text-align: left; background-color: transparent; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);">对批次内的负样本重新加权</span></font><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">在其基础上实现双向的对比损失函数</span></font><br></div><div><font><span style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); background-color: transparent;"><br></span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="330" width="150" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-19" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="150" width="150" height="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xDsj-cH_TAcwYINW5rGb-6" value="<b><font style="font-size: 12px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">研究背景</font></b><div><font face="Helvetica" style="font-size: 12px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">现有的工作多数止步于物体级别匹配，</font><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">忽视了</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));" data-end="1179" data-start="1164">位姿估计与场景布局重建</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">需求。</span></div><div><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-19" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="150" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-3" value="<b><font style="font-size: 12px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">关键技术</font></b><div><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">实现检索→位姿→布局框架</span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-19"> <mxGeometry y="108" width="150" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-15" value="<font face="Helvetica"><b style="">实现目标</b></font><div>构建物体检索<span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">→物体位姿估计</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">→场景布局重建框架。实现端到端的基于跨模态检索的三维场景建模</span></div><div><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div><div><font><span style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); background-color: transparent;"><br></span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-19"> <mxGeometry y="180" width="150" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-20" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="150" width="165" height="305" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-17" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;opacity=40;dashed=1;dashPattern=12 12;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-20"> <mxGeometry x="-15" y="-15" width="180" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-7" value="<b>研究背景</b><div><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" face="Helvetica">现有的工作<span style="background-color: transparent;">忽视了各模态内部细微几何</span><span style="background-color: transparent;">/</span><span style="background-color: transparent;">语义特征以及模态间可互补的信息，存在缺少融合特征的问题</span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-20"> <mxGeometry width="150" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-9" value="<b>关键技术</b><div>设计多模态特征融合网络</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-20"> <mxGeometry y="108" width="150" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-13" value="<b>实现目标</b><div>在共享空间对齐点云、图像与文本嵌入的同时，引入双向重构方法，在文本语义引导下互补生成特征，补足几何纹理与语义细节，实现不同模态特征融合<br></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-20"> <mxGeometry y="180" width="150" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-22" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;opacity=40;dashed=1;dashPattern=12 12;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="135" width="180" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dgXX3PdiFGPTYGPwJK_W-23" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;opacity=40;dashed=1;dashPattern=12 12;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="468" y="135" width="180" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 176px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 基于跨模态检索的三维建模方法研究

switch.text: 基于跨模态检索的三维建模方法研究

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 203px; margin-left: 206px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: 引入困难负样本挖掘算法

switch.text: 关键技术 引入困难负样本挖掘算法

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 115px; margin-left: 206px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span: 忽略了具有挑战性的难分负样本，存在模型的判别能力弱与检索精度低的问题

switch.text: 研究背景 现有的工作忽略了具有挑战性的难分负样本，存在模型的判别能力弱与检索精度低的问题

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 305px; margin-left: 206px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.font: 实现困难负样本挖掘：按相似度阈值筛选“语义接近但不匹配”的假负例，对批次内的负样本重新加权
font.span: 在其基础上实现双向的对比损失函数

switch.text: 实现目标实现困难负样本挖掘：按相似度阈值筛选“语义接近但不匹配”的假负例，对批次内的负样本重新加权在其基础上实现双向的对比损失函数...

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 现有的工作多数止步于物体级别匹配，
div.span: 位姿估计与场景布局重建

switch.text: 研究背景现有的工作多数止步于物体级别匹配，忽视了位姿估计与场景布局重建需求。...

div.span: 实现检索→位姿→布局框架

switch.text: 关键技术 实现检索→位姿→布局框架

div.div: 构建物体检索→物体位姿估计→场景布局重建框架。实现端到端的基于跨模态检索的三维场景建模

switch.text: 实现目标构建物体检索→物体位姿估计→场景布局重建框架。实现端到端的基于跨模态检索的三维场景建模...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 115px; margin-left: 16px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 现有的工作忽视了各模态内部细微几何/语义特征以及模态间可互补的信息，存在缺少融合特征的问题

switch.text: 研究背景 现有的工作忽视了各模态内部细微几何/语义特征以及模态间可互补的信息，存在缺少融合特征的问题

div.div: 设计多模态特征融合网络

switch.text: 关键技术 设计多模态特征融合网络

div.div: 在共享空间对齐点云、图像与文本嵌入的同时，引入双向重构方法，在文本语义引导下互补生成特征，补足几何纹理与语义细节，实现不同模态特征融合

switch.text: 实现目标在共享空间对齐点云、图像与文本嵌入的同时，引入双向重构方法，在文本语义引导下互补生成特征，补足几何纹理与语义细节，实现不同模态特征融合...
